item.title: Clustering Multipath Components in Radio Channel Modeling

item.title: Medical Image Segmentation based on Evidence Theory and Its Accomplishment in FPGA
item.description: You can click here to download the Slides (Chinese version). The figure below shows the proposed algorithm, Below process shows an example of implementing the algorithm, It is clear that there are three rectangles in these two figures, which are surrounded by a grey outskirt. In the first image, the color of the first rectangle is close to the outskirt, making it difficult to dicriminate each other. In the second image, the second and third rectangles are close to each other.
